name: episome
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece of genetic material inside a cell that is separate from the main part of the DNA and can replicate (= copy itself) independently: Episomes are not essential to the survival of the cell. These strains of the bacteria carry mutations on the episome.
More examplesFewer examplesThe foreign DNA may be present as an episome.The contribution of elements such as episomes to this process is summarized below.The virus is maintained as an episome in infected cells and is able to replicate.Many important discoveries in modern biology have been made using E. coli and its episomes.
